name: Duelist: LUCA
description:
Weekly Game Jam - 154 - Rock Paper Scissors

Description

Duelist: LUCA is a short 2D pixel adventure game created for the
Weekly Game Jam - 154 - Rock Paper Scissors.

Luca sets out on an adventure, but before it can even begin, a band of skeletons emerges in the forest. Fight through them one at a time with a friendly game of Rock Paper Scissors!

Don't forget to look out for potions to keep you in the game if you happen to face an unlucky losing streak.
Can you make it to the other side of the forest?


Controls

WASD: Move

Space: Select

Q: Heal

Esc: Quit Game


Creators:

IisTom


Contact:

Tom Standing: tstanding99@gmail.com


Resources:

Forest ambience by Tabletop Audio (Olde Towne)

https://tabletopaudio.com/olde_towne_sp.html

All other content was made by the creator during the Weekly Game jam - 154
